Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Protocite Bars^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
There is a rare metal native ^red;only^reset; to ^orange;Proto Worlds^reset; that I am in dire need of. I need 2 ^orange;Protocite Bars^reset;. You can smelt them in a ^orange;Fission Furnace^reset;.
Without ^green;protocite^reset; you won't be able to make some of the more essential high-end gear. So stay stocked! In return for that bit of help, perhaps try ^green;this thing^reset; on!
